sentences.simplifiedText: 毕竟, 他是你的朋友。
sentences.traditionalText: 畢竟, 他是你的朋友。
sentences.pinyin: Bìjìng, tā shì nǐ de péngyǒu.
sentences.translation: After all, he is your friend.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他可能不是最优秀的人,但毕竟是我最信任的人。
sentences.traditionalText: 他可能不是最優秀的人，但畢竟是我最信任的人。
sentences.pinyin: Tā kěnéng bùshì zuì yōuxiù de rén, dàn bìjìng shì wǒ zuì xìnrèn de rén.
sentences.translation: He might not be the best person, but he is after all the person I trust the most.

definitions.meaning: when all is said and done

sentences.translation: After all, we are still young.

sentences.simplifiedText: 即使我犯了错误，你也不应该那样对我，毕竟我是你的朋友。
sentences.traditionalText: 即使我犯了錯誤，你也不應該那樣對我，畢竟我是你的朋友。
sentences.pinyin: Jíshǐ wǒ fànle cuòwù, nǐ yě bù yīnggāi nàyàng duì wǒ, bìjìng wǒ shì nǐ de péngyǒu.
sentences.translation: Even if I made a mistake, you shouldn't treat me like that, after all, I'm your friend.
